name: .DCMF File Extension
summary: Learn about .DCMF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A DCMF file is a catalog created by DiskCatalogMaker, a file cataloging application for macOS. It contains a database that lists files' names, locations, and other metadata. You can use DiskCatalogMaker to view and search the catalog a DCMF file contains.

content: DiskCatalogMaker allows Mac users to scan their hard drive and/or external storage media and catalog the files stored there. Users can then view, search through, and print these catalogs, to find where certain files are stored.

Most commonly, DiskCatalogMaker users save their catalogs as DCMF files. These are database files that can be opened only in DiskCatalogMaker. Users can also save catalogs as .DCMD files, which contain thumbnail images for certain files.
NOTE: Some versions of Roxio Toast include a special version of DiskCatalogMaker, called DiscCatalogMaker RE (Roxio Edition).

instructions: You can open a DCMF file in Fujiwara DiskCatalogMaker (Mac). Select File → Open... from the program's menu bar, then open your DCMF file.

You can use Fujiwara DiskCatalogMaker to convert a DCMF file's contents to the .CSV (Comma-separated Values) or .TXT (Plain Text) formats. To do so, select File → Export, then choose your export format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
